thread.section_title: Timhotel Montmartre - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: A birthday treat in Paris!
thread.title_full: A birthday treat in Paris! - Review of Timhotel Montmartre, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: JWfromSussex
title: A birthday treat in Paris!
text: Hotel in nice position, close to Sacre-Coeur, bars and restaurants. Fantastic views of the city. Room quite small on top floor and shower also too small but everything was extremely clean and looked as if it had been recently redecorated. Extremely comfortable bed. Did not have the breakfast as cheaper (and very nice) options in bars 2mn away. Staff very friendly.
